Thanks for this! Next time I suggest you add the file type and the bitrate (for example, mp3 192 KB/s).

If you are interested, the best way to rip (generally) is to rip v0 mp3. v0 is variable bit rate, meaning the bit rate changes throughout the song depending on what is going one. A silent part of the song won't need as much data as a loud orchestrated part, for example.

v0 sounds as good as 320 KB/s mp3, but because it doesn't have as much data for some sections, it is smaller than 320 KB/s mp3.
